CONTENT: This is Scrooge. I got your phone plus contract as a gift from my great nephews and now the duration they paid for expired. I don't want to pay these horrible rates. I am a poor man. And I need my money to swim in it every morning. Yes, your coverage is ok. Yes, the phone is ok, the display is actually rather nice. But the rate is unacceptable. What? I will buy your measly company and then you will all be sacked. Good bye.
